task.title: Configure closed caption visibility and style
task.shortdesc: The SettingsActivity sets the default caption track that is the default for the entire player application. The CCManager refers to this configuration setting when it sets up the initial track for the media item.

context.p: Edit the SettingsActivity.java file to configure the closed captions visibility and style.

step.cmd: Convert the preference header ID to the preference key string for that category.
